data.name: The first time that the application is run for each user, a change to the Windows Registry is being made to ensure that disabling works. If at first, disabling does not work for you try to restart the computer to refresh Registry settings.
data.value: The first time that the application is run for each user, a change to the Windows Registry is being made to ensure that disabling works. If at first, disabling does not work for you try to restart the computer to refresh Registry settings.

data.name:
The first time you run the application this settings window is being shown.

However, next times the application will run hidden, minimized to the Windows system tray and you can access the Settings window by doing a right click and selecting Open from the menu.

 You can also uncheck the option [Minimize to System Tray].
data.value:
The first time you run the application this settings window is being shown.

However, next times the application will run hidden, minimized to the Windows system tray and you can access the Settings window by doing a right click and selecting Open from the menu.

 You can also uncheck the option [Minimize to System Tray].
